title: vAzhuvOm ulagIr
sahitya:
vAzhuvOm ulagIr varambillAda sama yOgattil varumai maDamai aDimaiyinri


anupallavi

  pAzhum porAmai tarum paghai sinanduyarinri paNbOngi naNbOngi tiNbOngi anbOngi


caraNam    mei jnAna yOgamum vigjnAna bhOgamum vEdAnta jnAnamum siddhAnta mOnamum
sugjnAna jIvanil sutantara shivanuDan tulangi ilangum turiyAtIta shuddha yOga tattuva siddhiyil
